storyInfo:
Patriot's death leaves a mark upon everyone. W provokes Kal'tsit and the Doctor only to be sent flying. Mephisto goes to sleep within the sarcophagus, and the Rat King stands in front of Wei Yenwu.
It's snowing in Lungmen.

attributes.content: You're hurt?!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Don't worry. Just a scratch.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: How is that just a scratch? Come here, I have disinfectant wipes.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Look, I'm fine...
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Turn your face this way!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Fine, fine.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: ...The wound is deep, but not very wide. It's as if... there's a trace of Arts.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: ...Did old Ch'en do this to you? That blasted woman...
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Hah... It's fine. Girls of her age are bound to do stuff like this.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: ...Hoshiguma, I'm really scared. I'm scared that she'll...
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: That she'll join Reunion?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Yeah...
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I also played with Talulah when I was young.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Even though I don't remember very clearly, I do know... that I really liked being her friend.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Even if she was bossy and had a temper, she always stood up for us.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: She never said anything, but she never backed down. She was always the first to charge ahead, and never asked us for help...
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: She beat up kids who were older than her. She was the only one who could get Ch'en to snap out of her funks.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I'm afraid that...
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: She won't.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I'm telling you, Ch'en's heart is rarely on the same page as her mouth.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: But, she will always be Ch'en of Lungmen. No matter what she might say, all her dreams, all her goals, her entire life... has always been right here.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: So, why'd you try to stop her then?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: ...I was worried she'd get herself killed. Obviously.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Swire, you'll have an important role in the L.G.D. after this.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: As if I could do that. I'm not her...
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Oh, so you're admitting she's better than you?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I just don't think I'm cut out for the L.G.D.!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: No, Missy, you absolutely are.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I'm not cut out for it. Neither is ol' Ch'en. Or Nine.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: The one who really makes the L.G.D. shine... is you.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: You have to take responsibility. You're the only one who can do it.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I'm jaded now, and there's a lot I don't see. I just want this city to become a place that accepts everyone.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I feel the same.
You—
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: It's been a long time, Miss Swire.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Hello, Inspector Hoshiguma.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Why is the esteemed daughter of the Rat King at this run-down place?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: What are you planning to do to her? Let me say this, if you're planning to harm even a single hair on Missy's head...
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I have no such intentions.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: You... screwed up.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Maybe.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Sometimes, we have no choice.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I don't think there's ever a time... where we don't have a choice.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Look up in the sky.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: It's going to snow. Can you choose for it to stop?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Why... is it snowing?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Go to sleep, go to sleep♪
Daddy's grey hair, Mommy's needles♪
Crap, we're exceeding the solubility threshold! Manually release the exhaust valve, now!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: That bout of volatility just caused a violent heat-absorbing effect. If we don't increase emissions, the entire cabin's going to be ruined!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: The rainclouds haven't moved much either... At this rate, we're in for some major snow.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: This FrostNova... what kind of person was she?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: All dreams sink to the bottom of the lake~♪
...'tis a reality that even time cannot shake~♪
*cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Damnit... What an ugly song.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Damn it!!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Why was FrostNova so good at it? I really... can't sing well...
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: It's snowing...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: This old man...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: His crystallization rate is over sixty percent now. Even a Sarkaz shouldn't be able to move.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: His consciousness has already dissipated... However, his iron will continues to ripple from his body.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...Buldrokkas'tee.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Resentment. Hatred. Remorse.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's all gone now.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The only thing that's left is wrath.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The unwillingness to accept FrostNova's fate. The hostility towards Talulah's actions. The endless longing for Ursus and Kazdel...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: A fiery and unquenchable wrath. For all the injustice around the world. For all those who fell around him... Towards those that would play with the fates of others.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: To resist fate is to resist everything. Everything that contributes to the idea of 'destiny.'
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Buldrokkas'tee's wrath... scorched this entire world.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...This entire, injustice-filled world.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Mr. Patriot...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Move your hand.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: You, Cautus Infected.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: ...We will complete the Captain's unfinished business.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: ...It's enough.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Do you want him to die for nothing?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: He didn't want any of you to die. He wanted all of you to find another path.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: He chose to die alone so that all of you could live...!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Who said we'll be the ones who die?
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: And we also heard what he said.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: ...Cautus. You're the source of all the ruin to come.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: The ancient prophecies have all been fulfilled.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.options: But FrostNova put her faith in us!

attributes.content: ...Still...
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: FrostNova... and now even the Captain...
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.options: Of course he wouldn't just buy into FrostNova's assessment!
He just happened to ignore his daughter's opinion...
He didn't go into any of this on blind faith.
The decision he made... is truly just!
And you choose to believe some prophecy?

attributes.content: ...No, it's not that we believe in the prophecy.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: We believe in the Captain.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.options: ...FrostNova's candy was spicy.

attributes.content: ...What?!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Yelena... let you try her candy?
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.options: I trusted her, and she trusted me.
If you really want to take someone's life...
At least be there to see it yourself!;Don't blindly follow someone else!;You must follow your own will until the bitter end.

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Rhodes Island, we get some of what you're saying. But we'll never see eye-to-eye.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: We've followed the Captain our entire lives, but we we didn't do it blindly.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: If... one day, that Cautus girl there turns into a tyrant like Talulah...
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: We will end you.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: The Captain fought against all those people... against slavers, oppressors, corrupt rulers, and those who brought ruin. None could escape.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: The Captain knew. About all the people in Chernobog who lost their lives to the Catastrophe. About all our battle brothers who died in vain.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: He had his regrets, but knew he couldn't escape. He has set us free now, though. We belong only to the Captain and the ideals he fought for, not to Reunion.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: We will take up his 'Aegis' from now on. Not as the Aegis of the Infected, but as defenders of all the enslaved.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: We'll keep an eye on you, Cautus. If you take even a single step onto the wrong path, we swear to hunt you down.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: We will treat these prophecies... as our secrets.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Because before that, we have a tyrant waiting for us in the control tower.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: ...The person who pushed you into a war against us and brought about this chain of tragedies is the leader of Reunion, Talulah.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We're going to regroup. We need to tell the guerrillas the news.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: As for you... Continue to carry out your mission, if that's what you want.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Snow... flakes...?
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: This heavy snow... Is Yelena coming to pick up the Captain...?
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Amiya, don't be too concerned about it.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The Sarkaz people have a long history with Originium. Their memories mix with Originium and become one with the land, returning to their own bodies.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Sometimes, certain tribes that have long passed down these Originium crystals will gather this information in one place.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Through the continuous use of Arts, this information, mixed together unexpectedly, manifests in different ways.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Most of these messages are lost to time, their contents jumbled or outdated. There is no basis for these prophecies.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But, they directly affect other people.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Like... someone hears these prophecies and starts to try to fulfill them, right?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I can't tell if these ideas are just vague whispers... or seeds that can bloom into reality. I really can't tell, but...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: He could have killed me.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But... he thought...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'll kill her now.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Stop. How are you so sure that she's our enemy?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: She is Kashchey's heir! She'll poison us all, just like that old serpent!
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: No, you stubborn old man... You're wrong.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Even if she's bound to turn out like that in the end, we can't kill her now.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Because she's not Kashchey right now. Eh, who even is that? I can't understand you. All I know is, she's just Talulah.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: ...Who put these ideas in your head? It will twist your will to fight.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Twist? ...As if, old man. This whole idea of a pure warrior's spirit? If you really had that, I never would've met you.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: If you really had that, we wouldn't be able to sit around a fire and have soup like we are now.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: You're... just sixteen.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Did your soup get cold?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Always been cold. It's better that way.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I'll listen to you this time.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: No, Father. That's not how it works.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: If you believe you're right, then... no matter what happens, you should keep on believing that.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Because if something happens to Talulah, that's between her and her people.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: But reality is just what's in front of us. Right, Father?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: No matter what the future has in store, right now, I am I, and you are you.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: No matter how much you dwell on it, we are who we are today. The only ones who we can change are ourselves, and we are the ones who will make that decision.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Let's try walking her path and see what happens.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: ...You'll be a great leader in the future.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I don't want to become a leader. I just want a comfortable life with my brothers and sisters, my uncles and aunts, and you.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I'll remember that.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Are you sure?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I won't forget.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Rosmontis... Dr. Kal'tsit... Doctor...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...He could've killed me... Mr. Buldrokkas'tee... could have killed me.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But I saw... I saw what he was thinking.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: He didn't do it. He stopped himself, at the end.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I can still... hear him...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Tell me the most important thing. What was the last thing he said?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: 'I have seen. Woe and tragedy.'
'I have seen. Death and carnage.'
'I have seen. Neglect and blasphemy.'
'But someone once told me. It is all in our hands. If in the future, this is all that awaits us...'
'O, little King of Sarkaz. It is all in our hands. If this is fate...'
'Then I reject it.'
He said... He asked...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: He sighed...
'My Lord... Where will you go?'
...Then nothing more.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor... I've read it all. I've seen everything.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I read his entire life.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Buldrokkas'tee... He admitted that he betrayed his convictions twice in his life.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The first, was when he left Kazdel and walked away from his life as a Sarkaz warrior.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The second, was when he stood up against Ursus and walked away from his life as a warrior of the Ursus Empire.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And just now... I'd say he made his final betrayal. He betrayed Reunion and the Infected he served, and stopped being a warrior of the Reunion Movement.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: With his death ends his last act of betrayal.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: He betrayed everything he cared about, because he has always stood up for his beliefs.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But this... isn't right, is it?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: This kind of 'sublime betrayal' is a sort of release for those who deceive the world. It is an easy way to move things towards the best outcome.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But not for Buldrokkas'tee.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Do you mean that...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Speak up, Amiya.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...Kazdel is Mr. Buldrokkas'tee's home.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Even though he's come so far, he's always wanted to go back to Kazdel... It's not that he didn't want to go back home, but that he couldn't. He had to pay the price first... for his betrayal.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ursus is his motherland. He fought for Ursus all his life... and blamed himself for the death of his son.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: He believed that Ursus was evil, but for the sake of this land, he gave his life... fighting until the very end. He also paid the price for his second betrayal.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: This time... he had to stand up against Talulah. But he foresaw that some of the people he strove to protect would die because of his actions.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Even though the decision he made preserved a future for the Infected, he... only felt pain... for the deceased.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: This is his third act of betrayal, and the reason he was so determined to atone for it. From beginning to end, this battle was to make up for the consequences of his betrayal.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Through these three times, fate ended up pushing him further and further when he just wanted to turn back. He hated the cruelty and mockery of fate. He never wanted to follow it, but he bore the consequences for it all the same.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ten years, twenty years... I'd be able to understand. But... too much time had passed. After facing all those regrets for so many years, too much time had passed.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: At the very end, even I could not understand.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: He could've taken my life, but he stopped at the end.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...He defeated his lifetime of suffering, his centuries-old ideology, and his love for this entire world.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: He no longer followed the principles he had adhered to for countless years. He... succumbed to fate.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No, saying that would defile his memory. Rather, he chose to ignore everything he had been resisting, and overcame the final obstacle within his own heart.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: He entrusted the future to you. This time, he gladly chose to do what he thought was right, rather than torture himself to maintain a certain ideal.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Of course, deep in his heart, this part is as you described...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It once belonged to Talulah, and now belongs to you. But it has always belonged to FrostNova.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Patriot... FrostNova...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit. Rosmontis... and Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I will end this war.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Right here. Right now.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I'll be with you, Amiya. Always.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Even if you can save many people, you'll cause immense suffering.
Anger. My anger comes from the injustice that fate has dealt to this world.
After countless years... are things finally coming to a head?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: How could something like that happen? This prophecy... is it not just another fragment of Sarkaz history?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Core City Warehouse District
Why is one of Patriot's men over here? This isn't your patrol area.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: You, let him go.
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: Ngh...!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: I'll let it slide this time. A little warning, don't stick your nose where it doesn't belong next time.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: I just received news.
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: ...Patriot has passed away.
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: That's some big news.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: So, right now... we have no more reason to keep up this charade.
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: Your band of devils smells far worse than any of our Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: What happened? How did Patriot die?!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Take care of this Reunion scum first!
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: You're picking a fight with the core city?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: What's wrong with that?
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: ...Even Patriot is dead. You bastards... I won't tolerate you any longer!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: If Patriot is dead, then what value does Reunion even have?!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Guerrillas! If there's anything I can do to help... tell me!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: First, we're going to throw everyone who would toy with the lives of the Infected... right off these city walls!
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: Mantra-2, put on the uniform. Closure has already hacked the identification code, so make sure not to reveal your hidden weapons.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: News of the incident should have spread already. What we need now is...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Chaos?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: No, order. Go help the guerrillas. Let the Infected, the well-intentioned Reunion members, and those who fight against injustice rally under one banner.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Just as if Talulah was unable to engineer Patriot's death.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What...? What? What did he say?
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Patriot is dead!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: The one who was truly looking out for Reunion! The one who fought for all of us! Patriot is dead!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Talulah orchestrated this conspiracy against Patriot! ...She's an agent of Ursus!
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: Who'd believe your nonsense?!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Wait... Talulah has been acting strangely. She gave an order forbidding us from maintaining communications in the city.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: What does that prove?!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: It proves... that the mercenaries are going to ambush the guerrillas! I see their plan... those lunatics!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Stop! Don't fight us, if you value your lives. Otherwise, we'll destroy you!
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: We are the Aegis of the Infected, and we'll battle every last enemy for our peoples! Even if we have to stand against Talulah!
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: For Patriot!
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: For Patriot!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Things have gotten a bit messy. You should leave soon.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: What about you?
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Us mercs have our own priorities. We don't care about Talulah's plots. Do your best, and live on.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: For the future of the Infected!
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: For...
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: ...Captain Faust!
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: For all our comrades who've been betrayed by Talulah! For Faust!
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Patriot is dead! Patriot is dead! Talulah betrayed Patriot! Talulah betrayed us all!
Are you sure it wasn't an outsider that killed him? I saw someone else kill him, not Talulah!
Patriot plotted with the Ursus Army to try to kill the Leader! Open your eyes and see the truth! Patriot is the traitor!
Patriot must have foreseen this.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But, his struggle against the storm was in vain. Even the 'Aegis' have adopted his most radical ideas, and not his pragmatic approach.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: After all this, the core city should descend into chaos. The Reunion Movement no longer exists.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Rosmontis, is this the revenge you wanted?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No, not yet. Not like this. I haven't seen the target yet. No...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: No matter who you face, the outcome is the same.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Reunion is just a symbol. No matter who is caught up in it or what they do... they are not an individual. They act as a part of Reunion.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Revenge... will only get you this far. We cannot distinguish their faces. We can only eliminate the symbol itself.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Rosmontis, you can continue to carry out your wishes. But... do you find this kind of vengeance satisfying?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Kal'tsit...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Am I wrong?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I... I just...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: It would be irresponsible of me to give you the answer.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Only you have the ability to pursue the things that you hold to be true. Rosmontis, I might not be the person who can answer that question.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Anger is entrenched into our bodies. Do we want to indulge ourselves, to let it flow and condense into hatred?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Or, can we turn it into a higher judge that measures all our future actions and illuminates our sanity?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Do you want to distinguish between right and wrong, or do you want to understand the reason why everything happens?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The lives and deaths of our operators, the sights that shake you... and the reasons why we feel these emotions.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Even if there are certain things that your mind erases, Rosmontis, they will always remain within you...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Maybe there are very few things in our lives that actually come down to right or wrong. Remove all these symbols, and only then do our lives have value.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I'm listening.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I want to know the reason.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}. We'll split up for the next part.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Rosmontis and I will go to the control tower. Dr. Kal'tsit will take you to the generator area.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: I won't see you for a while?

attributes.content: It's just a few hours, right?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: By the way, Doctor...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Even if I'm not at your side, I'll always know that Dr. {@nickname} is out there... fighting together with me.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Even out of sight, we still fight for the same goal.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm pretty happy with that.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: See you after the mission!;Goodbye.;Later, Amiya.

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Madame Ch'en may already be near the command tower. She's always been quick, so we'll have to pick up our pace.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor... Promise me that you'll stay safe.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Our work here only means anything if we make it back to Rhodes Island safely.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Be careful, okay?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: You too.

attributes.content: Chernobog Core City, Power Supply Sector

attributes.options: Why'd you pick me for your team?

attributes.content: Our decapitation strike team will be attacked by Reunion from all directions as they approach the control tower. I can't just drop you off in a battlefield like that.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: When we were fighting the guerrillas, we could retreat and buy ourselves time to regroup. That won't be possible for their team. They won't even have an opening to catch their breaths.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: This battle has a clear objective, and Amiya and Rosmontis's team can no longer afford any distractions.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You'll be safe with me.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: I don't feel safe around you.;......;You're not staying with Amiya?

attributes.content: We should only take on responsibilities that we can fulfill.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: After entering the sarcophagus, our communications will only further deteriorate.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: At that time, we will truly be fighting alone.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Wait...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Doctor, please stay hidden for a while.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Why?

attributes.content: ...If you don't want to, or if you're feeling claustrophobic, I won't stop you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ah... *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Where am I? How'd I blast my way down here... Is this it?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Huh? You're...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...Rhodes Island? What rotten luck I have today...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Hm?!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...What an unexpected reunion, Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...You're gravely wounded.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What do you go by now, W?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Still W. Didn't have time to change it yet.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Hold up, why are you casually milling around a place like this? Don't tell me...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: The old man's gone, huh?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: He died? How is that possible?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: But... then again, he wasn't going to survive this. He never backs down, and never lets anyone through.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You sound a bit heartbroken.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Guess so.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: That old fella was the only person who made me even give Reunion a second look.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Guess today... was that idealist's last.
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: He died a glorious death!;You don't understand anything.;Are you serious?
I saw him draw his last breath.

attributes.content: Kal'tsit, story time.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Do I have something to tell you?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You're asking me? You kidding? How do you have the nerve to stand there all calm like nothing ever happened?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: The Sarkaz woman glares at me with eyes that I had never seen before.
Though she directs her words at Dr. Kal'tsit, her eyes are fixed on me.
Kal'tsit, you're working with Dr. {@nickname}?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You? Working together with Dr. {@nickname}?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Is there a problem, W?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Of course, assuming you're not like this bastard here pretending you don't remember anything. But if that's true, guess it doesn't matter...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Otherwise, your brain cells got fried by one of your weird experiments.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Well shit, either I'm the crazy one, or you are. But even if I am crazy, that doesn't make you any less of a loon.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You're still clear-headed, W. Let's save the small talk for some other time.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Don't wanna. What even happened? Just looking at you makes me want to puke.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: But even if I'm trying not to throw up, this is just too funny.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Kal'tsit, you finally went bonkers too. Trying to tame the evil spirit of Babel?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Can't prove there are any memories left in this one's head. We're just working together for the time being.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: This so-called amnesia... How are you so sure that it's not all an elaborate act?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: It might have everyone fooled. Yes, everyone. You're fooled too, whether or not you want to admit it... That's the scorecard I got.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Kal'tsit, you're a monster, aren't you? A monster so smart you got a big, bright, glowy brain.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: And a monster should know better than me what happens when you have another monster around.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: There are too many creatures in this world that can be called 'monsters.' Throw the word around too much and it'll end up losing all meaning.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Or, you've just gone mad. That's a whole different matter.
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: What exactly do you know?

attributes.content: There's no place for you to cut in here, friend. When I finish with her, it'll be time for the two of us to have a nice, long chat.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: There's no point taking things out on you. Either you have amnesia, or you're just pretending to have amnesia...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: But this woman next to you is totally out of her mind.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I want to know—
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Back then, there was only one person who entered the Speaker's Office and knew Theresa's whereabouts. Kal'tsit, you know what that means, don't you?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Of course. I know it better than you do.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Those were your words!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: So what's the deal? What are you doing now?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Oh, I get it. You're trying to make another exchange. Tit-for-tat.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: But it's Theresa on the other end!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Those who don't know the truth shouldn't let conjecture affect their emotions, W.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I have just a single conjecture: You aren't human. Like I said before, if you'll bargain Theresa's death with a murderer... you're just a monster.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You're not human, Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I need to know the truth. And before I do, that thing next to you is a murderer; and I'll never show mercy to a murderer.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Ahh, I get it now.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You're bursting with motherly love, huh.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: W, you said before...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: 'We're the same type of person.'
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I don't know where you heard that before, you should pretend you never did. You and I are not the same type of creature at all.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: No, W. We are, to some extent.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: For example, you also want to put an end to Talulah's atrocities, correct?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...That's true. She's really pissed me off.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: So, I need to get my merc back from her. That piece of shit only knows how to squander her people. Such a spendthrift. I'm worried she'll blow all our savings and leave me penniless.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Right, so let's deal with the Reunion problem first.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Sure. I got my targets. Wanna hear?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: First is Talulah, that disgusting dragon lady upstairs.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Next is Theresis, the one that makes you want to sneeze as soon as you see him.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Those are some long-term plans.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: After that, the third I thing I want to kill is standing right next to you: Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You're only third on the list?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: I'm only in third place?

attributes.content: Hah. That's because I have something to ask you first, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I got some some long, thorough explanations to pull out of you...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: At this stage, we have a common goal.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: By the way, because of what you did to our employees in Chernobog...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: First, thanks for saving the lives of Dr. {@nickname} and the rescue team with your deal. Your 'deal' cost us thirteen of our operators.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Balancing these two things, I'm willing to give you a lift, for old time's sake. I'll take you to the command tower.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Kal'tsit... You really know how to gross a girl out.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I've always found you disgusting. I'll have to rearrange your face a little first, see which one of us comes out on top...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Mon3tr.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Howls)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: You bitch!
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: Mon3tr just grabbed her... and tossed her out like a ragdoll?

attributes.content: I don't have time to play with her.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Mon3tr, blast through the ventilation pipes, the walls, and the base's outer and middle protective layers along with her.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You old hag!! N-n-n-n-next time, I swear I'm giving you a slow and painful d————
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I'm looking forward to it.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: I'm surprised you let her finish her first sentence.

attributes.content: Not like you can understand it.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Why don't you explain it to me then?

attributes.content: It's not time yet.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: When you see for yourself, you should understand.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Secrets are like wellsprings. Sometimes they will flow out, whether you want them to or not.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What a strange device.
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Where are you taking me?
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Will you fill the holes in my body, or mend my scars?
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Will you let me forget everything, just like the other one did for me, before?
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: If I was to forget everything...
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Do I want to forget?
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: I want...
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Can I make that choice?
Core City
...What's going on? Dark clouds? It's snowing?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But, it's also covered the sun for me. This'll make my next step a lot easier.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Ugh... I can't afford to take any more hits.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Tch... Are you scared of shedding a little blood, Ch'en Hui-chieh? What happened to your determination?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: There seems to be infighting among Reunion's ranks. This is the best time for me to move.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Are my hands trembling because I'm finally going to see you again?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: ...I must do what is right.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: It doesn't matter what you are now, whether or not you're the same Talulah I knew.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Talulah... we have a date.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: The snow sure is coming down hard...
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Just like... that one Christmas.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: You've never spoken to me about that.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Hm.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: But you already know.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Me knowing and you telling me are two separate things.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Princess, let's not embarrass Missy over here.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Madame Oni.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: ...Let's drop that title, Princess.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Madame Oni, the Lin family will never forget all you've done.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: But right now, I don't know if there will be an opportunity to reward you for it.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: What are you talking about? Of course you can.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: She... I know she'll succeed.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Ah Ch'en...
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Look at you, where'd all your willpower go?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Ah, what are you gonna do? Missy has always been like that.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Now now, Missy, there's no need to cry.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: You... Stop treating me like a child...
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Don't worry. Everything is going to be fine.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: But... this is the last time we'll see each other. I'm not ready yet... What if... I never see that smelly dragon again?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: That won't happen, Missy.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: There's this phrase that I really like. Mm, it goes like this: 'We'll meet again someday, somewhere.'
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: ...Yes. And when we look back at each other again, we will ask about our lives.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: ...Why?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: What's going on? Where are these tears coming from?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: It's as if... someone just told me about a death.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Who is it?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Everything in the core city has been unfolding according to my plan.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Patriot will die by the hands of the Infected, and the Sarkaz mercenaries will start fighting the ordinary Reunion forces.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Oh.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Patriot is dead? So it was Patriot.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: A true warrior. Such a name was not enough to describe you. Ursus itself was too small for your greatness.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: A patriot to the very end.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: ...Why am I crying? Is it out of nostalgia, or a courtesy to those who want to kill me?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: 'All sins must come to an end?'
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Then we shall see. If we are the sinners, then we will inevitably meet our end...
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: But I shall wait for you at that end.                      But I shall wait for her at that end.
Why are you here, Kojui?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Just like all those decades ago. When people get anxious, they make stupid decisions, and they end up pacing around here.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Funny, isn't it? Still haven't kicked this old habit after all these years.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Do you know what I'm going to do, Kojui?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I do happen to know. All thanks to that niece of yours, of course. You two are both cut from the same cloth of stupidity.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Kojui, you're not out here on a stroll. Even if you were, you shouldn't waste my time.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Is it ever a waste of time to talk to an old friend?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Do you not consider me a friend anymore, Wei Yenwu?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: If you do, promise me...
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I can't. I won't promise you anything.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: So be it. You're not going anywhere today.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: ...Don't think too highly of yourself.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: That's what I should be saying to you. Wei Yenwu, you've been up in that tower of yours too long, it's bad for your character. Come down and let out some of that hot air - it's good for you.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Better not blink, old windbag.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: What are the two of us... but a pair of old windbags?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: It's hard to imagine.Even the old Patriot can die.
Should I laugh? Should I shed a couple tears?
What's really funny is now that he's dead, you climbed all the way to the top of Reunion, second only to the Leader.
Ah, you've really outdone yourself. You should give yourself a pat on the back, W.
*clap* *clap*
Why do we cry? Because even he is dead. Ahh, alas, poor Patriot!
What thoughts went through his head as he died, and what was it like? Did he die on his feet or on his knees? If even he can die, then who among us can live?
Maybe he was the most likely to die.
Never knew how to keep a low profile. Only knew how to cling to a vague ideal. On this path he walked and walked, until everyone around him was gone. And then, he could finally rest in peace.
How sad.
Wait, doesn't that sound a bit like you, W?
Ehh? How am I anything like that?
W, don't lie to yourself. You're practically the same.
Nah, I never lie to myself. I'll never become like Patriot, because I can't.
I just can't.
Besides, death was... kind of a release for him, right?
But not for you, W. Death is the game of your life.
What doesn't kill you, puts you one step closer to death.
The closer you get to death... the closer you also get to madness.
Thanks, Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I dunno how I would've gotten out of that trash heap without you.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Oh yeah, Talulah...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Can you hear me, Talulah? Knock knock?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Forget it, it's no big deal. I just wanted to let you know...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ——I'm back.
attributes.name: W
